clarity_of_research_objectives.reason: The paper clearly states its aims to use population (normative) modeling to characterize cortical anatomy associated with autism and ADHD, examine effects of sex and age, investigate relationships with autistic/ADHD traits, and explore co-occurrence.
clarity_of_research_objectives.supporting_text: METHODS: Here, we used population modeling and a large, multisite neuroimaging dataset ... We also examined sex and age differences and relationship with autistic traits and explored the co-occurrence of autism and ADHD. ... Population modeling ... provides a unified framework for studying age-specific and sex-specific divergences in brain development.

clear_definition_of_target_population.reason: Diagnostic groups (autism, ADHD, TD controls), sex, and age ranges are clearly described. However, uniform diagnostic criteria (e.g., DSM/ICD) are not specified across datasets in this manuscript.
clear_definition_of_target_population.supporting_text: T1-weighted scans were combined from 49 sites across 7 datasets ... final dataset after quality control (QC) included 4255 individuals ... ages 2â€“64 years ... Individuals with MRI data and a primary diagnosis of autism or ADHD or no diagnosis were included. ... For details of each dataset, demographics before and after QC, and group differences, see Supplemental Methods Section 1.

clarity_of_inclusion_and_exclusion_crite.reason: QC-based exclusion is described with explicit FSQC threshold and Euler covariate. Sample attrition before/after QC is tabulated. Beyond QC-related criteria, uniform inclusion/exclusion standards across studies are not fully specified.
clarity_of_inclusion_and_exclusion_crite.supporting_text: All scans underwent manual QC ... FSQC tool ... A cutoff of 2.5 was used for FSQC. ... Sample demographics and N before and after quality control (QC).

details_of_data_preprocessing.reason: Preprocessing is described: FreeSurfer v6.0.1; DK atlas parcellation; hemisphere averaging; manual QC with FSQC (cutoff 2.5); Euler number included as covariate.
details_of_data_preprocessing.supporting_text: T1 images ... processed using FreeSurfer, version 6.0.1 ... Desikan-Killiany atlas ... measures were averaged across hemispheres ... All scans underwent manual QC ... FSQC ... cutoff of 2.5 ... included Euler number as a covariate.

clarity_of_data_partitioning_methods.reason: No train/validation/test split was used for this study dataset; out-of-sample centile scores were computed using pre-trained reference models.
clarity_of_data_partitioning_methods.supporting_text: Out-of-sample centile scores for our study sample were generated based on these reference models using Brent's maximum likelihood estimation.
